titleInfo.title: Letter from Benjamin Jervis, East India Company Resident at Bushere [Bushire], to Peter Elwin Wrench, East India Company Agent at Bussora [Basra]

mods.abstract: The letter gives the case for assisting Carem Caun [Karim Khan] against Meer Mahanna [Mīr Muhanna] at Bunderick [Bandar Rig] with the Company ship the Tartar. It is believed this vessel is insufficiently equipped to make an attack on Khish [Kish] Island, where the stolen treasure of the Islamabadis being held, but it could take Mr Hollamby there to try negotiation.Other news given:the imminent arrival of a caffala from Schirass [Shiraz];the raid on a caffala by Mīr Muhanna's men between Shiraz and Bushire;Karim Khan's men are close to Bandar Rig.
